name: Pashu Kavak
description:
Hello and Welcome!
Begin your journey with Pashu Kavak and explore the Forest of the Banyan.
Use Jantu to take care of and protect the lovely trees!
Expand your network, trim your trees, have some figs, and keep things pest free.

So what are you waiting for? Hop on it and take part in this soothing adventure!

Jantu
Baa -  Remove Invaders, Trim the Overgrown Trees
Patta - Remove Invaders, Soothe the Roots, Dig Defense
Masha - Lay Mycelium tracks to connect the Roots

[Patrol] Shift + Right Click 
Repeat back and forth from next location.

Patta - Dig Tunnel (Deepen)
Masha - Connect Roots (Strengthen Connection)

A game designed for Global Game Jam 2023
[Virtually] Hosted by Portland Indie Game Squad!
Theme: Roots
